alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:44PM EDT until July 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Montgomery County in east central Kentucky... Western Bath County in east central Kentucky... Central Fleming County in east central Kentucky... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 444 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carlisle, or 13 miles southwest of Flemingsburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bethel and Odessa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
